name: Medieval Nanny Simulator
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 and theme was: OUT OF CONTROL

The children must go to bed, but they are OUT OF CONTROL!
And you can get also OUT OF CONTROL in the in-game level Nanny Editor™!

As an experienced Nanny™ you know the best medieval method to get kids to sleep in these tough times is to spook them with...ehm towers popping out of the ground? Yea whatever just do it quickly before it gets dark and the little children will get eaten by wolf or demons or whatever. Also don't launch kids into the air, please.

Embody the role of child wrangler and be the role model of the medieval nursing services!

Got your own level in our Nanny Editor™? Share with us the endless fun of chasing the children in the comments or on Twitter!

Made by:
Coding master and the one in unity with ehm...Unity 
@TondaFSCZ

Art thief (also talented artist himself) and Michael Winslow type
@KubaSpirik

Bear of all trades
@bearinyourheart
